C

clone() - Method in class com.github.sworisbreathing.ehcachefilemonitor.FileMonitoringCacheEventListener
Throws CloneNotSupportedException, since this instance does not support cloning.

D

dispose() - Method in class com.github.sworisbreathing.ehcachefilemonitor.FileMonitoringCacheEventListener
Prevents additional file monitoring and stops all current file monitoring.

F

FileLoadingCacheEntryFactory - Class in com.github.sworisbreathing.ehcachefilemonitor
A cache entry factory which loads object instances from a file.

FileMonitoringCacheEventListener - Class in com.github.sworisbreathing.ehcachefilemonitor
A cache listener which monitors files for changes as long as they are in the cache.

Creates a new FileMonitoringCacheEventListener.

G

getDirectory(File) - Method in class com.github.sworisbreathing.ehcachefilemonitor.FileMonitoringCacheEventListener
Gets the file as a directory, or its parent directory if the file is not a directory.

L

loadObjectFromFile(File) - Method in class com.github.sworisbreathing.ehcachefilemonitor.FileLoadingCacheEntryFactory

N

notifyElementEvicted(Ehcache, Element) - Method in class com.github.sworisbreathing.ehcachefilemonitor.FileMonitoringCacheEventListener
Stops monitoring changes for files which have been evicted from the cache.
notifyElementExpired(Ehcache, Element) - Method in class com.github.sworisbreathing.ehcachefilemonitor.FileMonitoringCacheEventListener
Stops monitoring changes for files which have expired from the cache, as they will no longer be retrievable.
notifyElementPut(Ehcache, Element) - Method in class com.github.sworisbreathing.ehcachefilemonitor.FileMonitoringCacheEventListener
Starts monitoring changes for files added to the cache.
notifyElementRemoved(Ehcache, Element) - Method in class com.github.sworisbreathing.ehcachefilemonitor.FileMonitoringCacheEventListener
Stops monitoring changes for files removed from the cache.
notifyElementUpdated(Ehcache, Element) - Method in class com.github.sworisbreathing.ehcachefilemonitor.FileMonitoringCacheEventListener
No-op.
notifyRemoveAll(Ehcache) - Method in class com.github.sworisbreathing.ehcachefilemonitor.FileMonitoringCacheEventListener
Stops monitoring changes for all files when the cache is emptied.
notifyStartMonitoring(File) - Method in class com.github.sworisbreathing.ehcachefilemonitor.FileMonitoringCacheEventListener
Notifies interested parties when we begin monitoring a file.
notifyStopMonitoring(File) - Method in class com.github.sworisbreathing.ehcachefilemonitor.FileMonitoringCacheEventListener
Notifies interested parties when we stop monitoring a file.
